channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- PubyDoc

item.title: CVE-2023-4970|2024-08-02T07:44:53.415Z -- unknown -- pubydoc
item.description: The PubyDoc WordPress plugin through 2.0.6 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed
